23.鍛冶とは 素材となる地金をたたいて|目的のアイテムを 作ることです。|<br>|:
Blacksmithing is the art of forging items by|striking the metal used to make them. As you|strike the metal, your forge level will|
|increase... Aim for the green success zone on|the gauge... The quality of the finished|product is determined by the accuracy... To|
|execute the forge command, you need to|concentrate. If you lose concentration, you|won't be able to execute them, so pace|
|yourself and choose your commands... The|metal has a temperature, and when the|temperature drops, it's hard to increase the|
|forge... If the metal gets too cold, the|session is over... Please note that if the|game is interrupted due to a communication|
|error while blacksmithing, all materials will|be lost...

24.ばくれつ打ちを使うと|一気に ６回 たたくことができますが|どこに当たるかは わ: With the Bakuretsu-uchi, you can hit him six|times in one go, but you never know where|you'll hit him!

25.冷やし込みを使うと|地金の温度を ３００度下げることができます。|すごく弱く た:
With the chill-in, you can lower the|temperature of the bullion by 300 degrees...|I use it when I want to hit something really|
|hard...

26.てかげん打ちを使うと|半分のチカラで たたくことができます。|細かい調整をしたい: If you use the Tekagen-uchi, you can hit it|with half the force... When you want to make|a fine adjustment...

27.会心0.1％アップは|覚えているだけで 常に会心率が|0.1％分 上がるようにな: Just remember that 0.1% increase in|Perception will always increase your|Perception rate by 0.1%...

28.会心0.2％アップは|覚えているだけで 常に会心率が|0.2％分 上がるようにな: Just remember that 0.2% increase in|Perception will always increase your|Perception rate by 0.2%...

29.会心0.3％アップは|覚えているだけで 常に会心率が|0.3％分 上がるようにな: Just remember that 0.3% increase in|Perception will always increase your|Perception rate by 0.3%...

30.会心0.3％アップは|覚えているだけで 常に会心率が|0.3％分 上がるようにな: Just remember that 0.3% increase in|Perception will always increase your|Perception rate by 0.3%...

31.会心0.5％アップは|覚えているだけで 常に会心率が|0.5％分 上がるようにな: Just remember that 0.5% increase in|Perception will always increase your|Perception rate by 0.5%...

32.みだれ打ちを使うと|一気に ４回 たたくことができますが|どこに当たるかは わか: If you use Multibash, you can hit four times|in succession, but the hits are random!

33.ねらい打ちを使うと|とぎすました 会心率の高い一発を放ちます。: When you use the Aiming Strike, you'll hit a|target with a high rate of accuracy...

35.３倍打ちを使うと|ひとつのマスを ３倍のチカラで|大きく鍛えられます。: If you use the triple strike, you can triple|the size of a single square...

36.火力上げを使うと|地金の温度を ３００度上げることができます。|カタくて鍛えにく: With the power up, you can raise the|temperature of the metal 300 degrees... It's|used when the metal is too hard to forge...

37.４連打ちは|やや強めのチカラで ２×２の４マス分を|広く鍛える 豪快な技です！: The quadruple strike is a powerful technique|that uses a slightly stronger force to train|four squares of 2 x 2.

39.鍛冶の遊び方の説明です！|<br>|熱くなった地金をたたくと 鍛え度メーターが|:
Here's how to play blacksmithing! As you|strike the hot metal, the forge meter will|rise... Adjust your forge meter so that it is|
|within the green success zone... When all|your gauges are within the green success|zone, you can use the "Finish" command. The|
|lower the temperature of the metal, the|harder it will be to raise the forge... Keep|an eye on the temperature of the metal and|
|your concentration as you work towards|completion!

40.２倍打ちを使うと|ひとつのマスを ２倍のチカラで|大きく鍛えられます。: If you use the double strike, you can train a|single square with twice the power...

41.超４連打ちは|２倍のチカラで ２×２の４マス分を|広く鍛える とても豪快な技です: The Super Four-Strike is a very powerful|technique that uses twice the power to train|four squares of 2×2.
